name: The Convincing General
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
As the game begins, if this creature is your commander, choose two creature types. For the rest of the game, treat those two types like they're the same among your creatures and creature cards everywhere.
{3}, {T}: Choose a creature type. Draw a card for each creature you control of that type.
flavor_text: Prize Card for the Unknown event at Gen Con 2024, August 4, 2024.

name: Archon of the Wild Rose
oracle_text:
Flying
Other creatures you control that are enchanted by Auras you control have base power and toughness 4/4 and have flying.
flavor_text: The curse of Redtooth Keep could only be broken by a mystical rose that blooms in moonlight.

name: Vaevictis Asmadi
printed_name: 暴虐の覇王アスマディ
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Vaevictis Asmadi unless you pay {B}{R}{G}.
{B}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{R}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
{G}: Vaevictis Asmadi gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Flensermite
oracle_text:
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

name: Triskelion
oracle_text:
This creature enters with three +1/+1 counters on it.
Remove a +1/+1 counter from this creature: It deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Why do bad things always come in threes?"
—Gisulf, expedition survivor

name: Rite of the Raging Storm
oracle_text:
Creatures named Lightning Rager can't attack you or planeswalkers you control.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player creates a 5/1 red Elemental creature token named Lightning Rager. It has trample, haste, and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this token."

name: Gorion, Wise Mentor
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever you cast an Adventure spell, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
set_name: Commander Legends: Battle for Baldur's Gate
flavor_text: "You are safest in Candlekeep, Abdel, but I cannot keep you from the world forever."
